data.title: Virginia Lawyers for Reckless Driving, DUI, DWI, Traffic and Criminal Offenses in Fairfax, Manassas and Leesburg
data.meta_description: The Gordon Law Firm -- Experienced Virginia attorneys. We defend reckless driving, DUI and DWI charges. Serving Fairfax, Loudoun and Prince William Counties.
data.text:
The Gordon Law Firm provides experienced, caring and effective representation in cases involving DUI, reckless driving, drug offenses, domestic assault, juvenile law and other criminal law matters. We’ve helped more than 5,000 clients in traffic and criminal cases. At our firm, you’ll work directly with our experienced attorneys, Alex Gordon and Carlos Wall, through every step of your case.

We recognize that communication is key for your peace of mind and success in court. Our clients can text, email or call Alex and Carlos any time for answers.
